name: Todoist(unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, ask Todoist unofficial which tasks are overdue”
”Set due date to tomorrow”
”Remind me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: todoist unofficial
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use this skill to manage your Todoist with Alexa and enjoy advanced features that are not available in the official Todoist integration!

Prerequisites:
- A Todoist account is required.
- Some features require a Todoist premium account. For further information, visit the Todoist website.

Usage:
- Search for items (by date, by content, or overdue)
- Go through the tasks by saying „next“
- ask for attributes like due date and priority or perform actions (“done”, “reschedule to tomorrow/friday/August 1st”, “set priority to 3”)

Features:
- create tasks and comments
- search for task content, due date, or overdue
- actions: set as done, change due date, change priority
and much more…

Do you have any questions or problems?
Try taking a look at my website (German): https://nicolaiweitkemper.de/alexa-skills/todoist/
Or write an e-mail to alexa@nicolaiweitkemper.de

Disclaimer: This application is not created by, affiliated with, or supported by Doist
